title: How to Block My Phone from Being Tracked - Cocospy Blog
description: Apr 23, 2020   But if you want to block your phone from being tracked altogether, here are some ways to do so: 1. Turn off Location Services. You can toggle off Location Services on both Android and iOS. This will prevent every installed app on your phone from accessing your location. Note that it will also turn off some location-based system services.

description: Shut the phone down completely and remove the battery. title: How to Tell If Your Cell Phone Is Being Tracked Tapped or ...
description: Mar 05, 2020   If you hear a voice telling you either 1 or 2, then it means your phone has not been infected by tracking software. If, however, you hear 3 or 4, then this means some is trying to, or already has, broken into your device. Try to reset the program of your device, although theres no guarantee if the reset will remove the spyware.
